-- auto-generated definition
create table gym_class
(
    id             bigint unsigned auto_increment
        primary key,
    gym_class_name varchar(255)  null,
    details        varchar(1000) null,
    choose_reason  varchar(1000) null,
    class_week     int           null,
    beginTime      time          null,
    endTime        time          null,
    emp_id         bigint        null,
    img1Url        varchar(255)  null,
    img2Url        varchar(255)  null,
    img3Url        varchar(255)  null,
    img4Url        varchar(255)  null
)
    comment 'classweek：上课时间(星期几)    emp_id：教练id    ps：所有表id字段为bigint则顺序增加(class、video、equipment、emp)，为varchar(255)则用uuid唯一表示(member、card、orders)';
